snippet: Nick Swisher is hitting .154 (4 for 26) this postseason and Yankees fans have responded with jeers and blame.
abstract: New York Yankees outfielder Nick Swisher, once a fan favorite, is feeling the sting of fans turning on him as he struggles in the postseason.
lead_paragraph: Nick Swisher is hitting .154 (4 for 26) this postseason and Yankees fans have responded with jeers and blame.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Nick Swisher Aware of Fans’ Dissatisfaction
